column4: I don't seem to get hangovers any more the next morning---is that good or bad? What does it mean? Fuck do I need to stop drinking or drink more to see if I get hung over?
Please watch your language so we can keep this family friendly. =D
This isn't the place to ask that, but in reference to your question it's because you've built up a higher tolerance. Drink more to get a buzz.
Please use www.google.com to find a more appropriate IRC chat to ask those questions in. =)
